## Risk Level

<!-- Select one: Low / Medium / High -->

- [ ] Low - Documentation, new files, or isolated changes
- [ ] Medium - Changes to existing functionality with clear scope
- [ ] High - Architectural changes, dependency updates, or broad refactoring

## Safety Checklist

Before submitting this PR, verify:

- [ ] The change is explicitly requested and scoped
- [ ] Only the minimal necessary change was made
- [ ] No existing code was modified outside the explicit scope
- [ ] The change follows the project's architecture
- [ ] All commits follow the commit message template
- [ ] Each commit addresses exactly one change
- [ ] The change has been tested (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if applicable)
